body_html:
The new API is available; we're working on adding attention and beam search over the next several weeks. Some examples of how to use it are here <https://github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow/blob/master/tensorflow/contrib/seq2seq/python/kernel_tests/decoder_test.py#L132> . We also hope to have a new tutorial in the next few weeks based on this API.
…
On Wed, Feb 8, 2017 at 3:45 AM, Illarion ***@***.***> wrote: Hi all Also I'd like to note that seq2seq tutorial <https://www.tensorflow.org/tutorials/seq2seq/> reference to some files like models/rnn/translate/seq2seq_model.py that does not exists now in the repo. There no any models folder at all. I think links should be pointed to outer repo *tensorflow/models*, to this folder <https://github.com/tensorflow/models/tree/master/tutorials/rnn/translate> . I've decided not open new issue, because this seems related to my info. But if I'm not right - please fix me. — You are receiving this because you were mentioned. Reply to this email directly, view it on GitHub <#6996 (comment)>, or mute the thread <https://github.com/notifications/unsubscribe-auth/ABtim7D2uPSeTQ_ariqJh1GIUaDBQGLXks5raaq-gaJpZM4LqHHc> .

The new API is available; we're working on adding attention and beam search
over the next several weeks.  Some examples of how to use it are here
<https://github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow/blob/master/tensorflow/contrib/seq2seq/python/kernel_tests/decoder_test.py#L132>
.

We also hope to have a new tutorial in the next few weeks based on this API.

body:
The new API is available; we're working on adding attention and beam search
over the next several weeks.  Some examples of how to use it are here
<https://github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow/blob/master/tensorflow/contrib/seq2seq/python/kernel_tests/decoder_test.py#L132>
.

We also hope to have a new tutorial in the next few weeks based on this API.

On Wed, Feb 8, 2017 at 3:45 AM, Illarion <notifications@github.com> wrote:

> pointed to outer repo *tensorflow/models*, to this folder
> <https://github.com/tensorflow/models/tree/master/tutorials/rnn/translate>
> .
> I've decided not open new issue, because this seems related to my info.
> But if I'm not right - please fix me.
>
